website_summaries.verdict: Although this is a fairly pricy model, its ergonomic spine rollers, wide range of massage variants, and full-body massage treatments quickly showcase this chair’s value.
pros: Deep recline and zero gravity positions
Gently massages entire body with 22 airbags

customer_reviews.title: NO Support
customer_reviews.text: No one answers the phone, email, or chat! My remote has not worked correctly upon receiving the chair. I tried to register the warranty and that failed. I call numerous times and no one picked up. I still have time to return this. I will be contacting AMAZON.
customer_reviews.author: Evans Swinson

customer_reviews.title: Moderately Effective
customer_reviews.text: I am six feet tall and the back track doesn't massage my neck area well enough. This may be because the automatic measuring doesn't work very well. Also, the calf massage doesn't reach my calves. This may be because I am too tall and my legs are too long to fit the chair well. Overall it does give a good massage and I especially like the heat feature. The leg massage area does lengthen when you push on it but it still doesn't go out far enough to allow the back of calf massage to engage.
customer_reviews.author: John P. Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Love the chair
customer_reviews.text: We love our chair! It was delivered on time and was easy to set up. The whole family uses this chair and loves it. The only complaint is that there is no instruction manual, especially for the remote. We have to reset it frequently. This involves turning off the power supply so the remote will reset and allow use.
customer_reviews.author: Linda W.

customer_reviews.title: Year later it's a $2000 dollar paper weight
customer_reviews.text: I bought it in Feb. 2020 and it no longer works. Hardly used it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Grinnell

customer_reviews.title: It’s not worth the price I paid
customer_reviews.text: The chair had two 2 inch tears on the right side
customer_reviews.author: Bishop Ray Barnes

customer_reviews.title: nicely made except for controller
customer_reviews.text: The reviews for this chair are misleading as it shows several different chairs on the customer reviews, not just the one chair. The chair I got is the one in the photo I included. I do not know the model, and I am pretty sure I paid way too much for the chair also, so be sure to check the prices, as I am now seeing the one I got for half the price I paid and less. The controller is very basic, and the options are very limited and not intuitive. It's OKAY, but definitely not work $2000. If I could return it I would.
customer_reviews.author: Mel Scooper

customer_reviews.title: It is a very useful massage chair
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair for my husband’s Christmas gift,he loves it so much!I even can’t stop him making a video for this chair!Easy to set up and very relaxing massage chair.
customer_reviews.author: Seth B.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful chair.
customer_reviews.text: Every family member loves it. I bought this chair for my family to relieve muscle aches and other aches or pains, which is part of today's lifestyle. After 30 minutes of yoga and physical exercise, I feel very relaxed. These controls are easy to use. It feels great from head to toe. It has many options, among which heating is one of them, and it is very comfortable. I think it is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Tizoruco

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!  Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing chair. My husband and I race to sit in it each night. It came fully assembled so we we're able to use it right out of the box. It perfect for sore muscles or just a relaxing way to end the day.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie S.

customer_reviews.title: Warranty?
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this on amazon it shows there is a 3 year warranty so I purchased it with confidence. Now it isn't working and I try to contact the manufacturer to get warranty service, but they don't show any way to contact them. I wouldn't recommend buying this item until then warranty process is clear and able to be used.
customer_reviews.author: R Scott Bell

product_meta.title: KTN Massage Chairs, Zero Gravity Massage Chair, Full Body Shiatsu Massage Chair Recliner with Space Saving, Yoga Stretching, SL Track, Bluetooth Speaker, Heat,Foot Roller
feature_bullets: 【Zero Gravity&Space Saving】There are 3 levels zero gravity angles, clicking the button to adjust a comfortable reclining angle. Meanwhile, our heart and knees are in a horizontal line, which can effectively reduce heart pressure and stimulate blood circulation. It also allows just about 3.94 inches between the shiatsu massager and wall.

【Yoga Stretching&Bluetooth Speaker】It comes with yoga stretching, while starting this function, your upper body and leg area can be stretched, also back area will be held by the massage chair. Wireless Bluetooth Speaker is installed with the massager.

【SL Double Tracks&3D massage Rollers】Connecting with ergonomics, SL Double tracks matches the shape of your spine and 3D massage rollers aim to adjust massage rollers’ height, width&depth ,then provides flexible acupoint massage for your neck, shoulder, back and legs area. Replicates the sensation of real human hands.

【Full Body Air Massage&3 Year Warranty】The chair recliner is covered with airbags on shoulders, arms, waist, hips, calves&feet area. And 3 levels intensity adjustable for you. The massage chair leather is eco-friendly and durable, can be used at least for 5 years. Our massage chair also comes with 3-Year warranty for you.

【Extendable Legrest&Adjustable Shoulder Width】 The electric foot massage part is adjustable and can be stretched to approx 7.1 inches to fit for different body height. And the shoulder width can be adjusted automatically according to your figure.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars8 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
